Value.label: Beaming Enable/Disable
Value.Help: Used to enable/disable beaming. If set to 1, FLiR commands will be supported and device type will be LSS. But the device must be re-included into the network to activate it.

Value.label: Motion Retrigger Time
Value.Help: Presence re-detection time set in second to allow motion sensor to reset timeout of motion sensor. In this time, the motion sensor can not be triggered again. If this value reach zero, the timeout configuration value set by Param3 will be reset. If value set to 0, retrigger is disable. Between 1-30 it is the delay in seconds. Between 30-3600 it is the timeout set in seconds.

Value.label: Motion Untrigger Time
Value.Help: Timeout configuration set in second for motion se sensor to send no tigger status.

Value.label: Motion Sensitivity
Value.Help: 0 - Disable. 1 is the minimum and 11 the maximum sensittivity.

Value.label: Motion Report Type
Value.Help: Set which commande class will be sent when motion sensor is triggered or detriggered.

Item.label: Sends Notification and Sensor Binary Report

Value.label: Vibration Sensor
Value.Help: Used to enbale/disable vibration sensor. Values possible between 0 - 255. 0 Disable Vibration, 1-254 Timeout set in minutes to reset vibration status, 255 Only send vibration triggered, does not timeout.

Value.label: Vibration Intensity Reports
Value.Help: Used to enable/disable vibration intensity reports.

Item.label: Enabled (Vibration intensity will be sen to gateway when triggered)

Value.label: Wakeup CC Timeout
Value.Help: Timeout set in seconds after Wakeup CC is send out before go to sleep. If role type is RSS, The minimum value will be 10. If role type is LSS, the minimum value will be 2. If wakeup no more information recevied, return to sleep mode immediatly.

Value.label: Power Status
Value.Help: This value is Readonly. Used to report the power status (USB or Battery powered). The device must be re-included in the network to change the role type.

Item.label: When the battery powered, the device will act as RSS.
When USB cable insert, the device will act as AOS

Value.label: Motion Group Control (Group2)
Value.Help: Set control of other devies on group2 based on motion trigger.

Item.label: Send BASIC_SET (0xFF) when motion is triggered to associated device Send BASIC_SET (0x00) when motion is untriggered to associated device
Send BASIC_SET (0x00) when motion is triggered Send BASIC_SET (0xFF) when motion is untriggered
Send BASIC_SET (0xFF) when motion is triggered, Nothing when motion untriggered.
Send BASIC_SET (0x00) when motion is triggered, Nothing when motion untriggered.
Send BASIC_SET (0x00) when motion is untriggered, Nothing when motion triggered.
Send BASIC_SET (0xFF) when motion is untriggered, Nothing when motion triggered.
Send BASIC_SET (value is configured by parameter 12) when motion is triggered to associated devices. Send BASIC_SET (value is configured by parameter 12) when motion is untriggered.

Value.label: Motion Group Value Setting
Value.Help: Set Basic Set value for Group2. The MSB will act as the basic set value when motion trigger. The LSB will act as the basic set value when motion untrigger. E.g. value=0x0A00, then BASIC_SET(0x0A) will be sent when motion trigger, BASIC_SET(0x00) will be sent when motion untrigger.

Value.label: Motion Group Control Requirement
Value.Help: Set threshold of Light Lux when devices associated in group2 should be triggered by motion. Associated device only receive BASIC_SET command when light inferior = (this value).

Value.label: Over Humidity Group Threshold (Group5)
Value.Help: Set threshold of humidity. If measured humidity >= (this value), send BASIC_SET (0xFF) to associated devices through group5. If measured humidity inferior (this value) send BASIC_SET (0x00) to associated devices through group5.

Value.label: Under Humidity Group Threshold (Group6)
Value.Help: Presence re-detection time set in second to allow motion sensor to reset timeout of motion sensor. In this time, the motion sensor can not be triggered again. If this value reach zero, the timeout configuration value set by Param3 will be reset. If value set to 0, retrigger is disable. Between 1-30 it is the delay in seconds. Between 30-3600 it is the timeout set in seconds.

Value.label: Over Heat Group Threshold (Group3)
Value.Help: Set threshold of temperature. Designed to control Air Conditioners or temperature controllers ON or OFF. If measured temperature superior= (this value, Scale is determined by Param64) send BASIC_SET (0xFF) to associated devices. If measured temperature inferior (this value) send BASIC_SET (0x00) to associated devices. E.g. Value 239 means 23.9 C.

Value.label: Under Heat Group Threshold (Group4)
Value.Help: Set threshold of temperature. Designed to control Air Conditioners or temperature controllers ON or OFF. If measured temperature inferior= (this value, Scale is determined by Param64) send BASIC_SET (0xFF) to associated devices. If measured temperature > (this value) send BASIC_SET (0x00) to associated devices. E.g. Value 155 means 15.5 C.

Value.label: Over Light Group Threshold (Group7)
Value.Help: Set threshold of Light/Lux. If measured light/lux >= (this value) send BASIC_SET (0xFF) to associated devices. If measured light/lux inferior (this value) send BASIC_SET (0x00) to associated devices.

Value.label: Under Light Group Threshold (Group8)
Value.Help: Set threshold of Light/Lux. If measured light/lux inferior= (this value) send BASIC_SET (0xFF) to associated devices. If measured light/lux superior (this value) send BASIC_SET (0x00) to associated devices.

Value.label: Over UV Group Threshold (Group9)
Value.Help: Set threshold of UV. If measured UV superior= (this value) send BASIC_SET (0xFF) to associated devices. If measured UV inferior (this value) send BASIC_SET (0x00) to associated devices.

Value.label: Under UV Group Threshold (Group10)
Value.Help: Set threshold of UV. If measured UV inferior= (this value) send BASIC_SET (0xFF) to associated devices. If measured UV superior (this value) send BASIC_SET (0x00 to associated devices.)

Value.label: Low Battery Threshold
Value.Help: Configure low battery report threshold, sends low battery report via notification and battery report when battery level drops under setting. Unit %.

Value.label: Threshold Check Enable/Disable
Value.Help: Enable/Disable threshold reporting, check time can be adjusted by Param45.

Value.label: Temperature Threshold
Value.Help: Threshold = (Value * 0.1) Scale is determined by Param64. 0 = disable.

Value.label: Humidity Threshold
Value.Help: Humidity range = 1% to 50%, 0 = disable.

Value.label: Lux Threshold
Value.Help: 0 = disable.

Value.label: UV Threshold
Value.Help: 0 = disable.

Value.label: Threshold Check Time
Value.Help: Set threshold check time in seconds if threshold is enable via Param40. 1~65535 - When USB powered 60~65535 - When Battery powered

Value.label: Low Temperature Report
Value.Help: Enable/Disable alarm report for low temperature(inferior= -15 C) Multilevel CC temperature report will be sent to gateway

Value.label: Sensor Limit Control
Value.Help: This value is bit mask. Used to enable/disable measurement reports for various sensors that is more than the upper limit value or less than the lower limit value.

Value.label: Temperature Upper Limit
Value.Help: Set upper limit level for temperature set in scale of 0.1. Scale is determined by Param64. If (Current measurement) superior (Upper Limit), then report sensor.

Value.label: Temperature Lower Limit
Value.Help: Set lower limit level for temperature set in scale of 0.1. Scale is determined by Param64. If (Current Measurement) inferior (Lower limit), then report sensor.

Value.label: Temperature Recover Limit
Value.Help: Temperature recover limit set in scale of 0.1. Scale is determined by Param64. If (Current measurement) inferior= (upper limit - recover limit), then temperature report. If (Current measurement) superior= (lower limit + recover limit), then temperature report.

Value.label: Humidity Upper Limit
Value.Help: Set humidity upper limit level.

Value.label: Humidity Lower Limit
Value.Help: Set humidity lower limit level.

Value.label: Humidity Recover Limit
Value.Help: Set humidity recover limit level. Refer to Param 51.

Value.label: Lux Upper Limit
Value.Help: Set lux upper limit level.

Value.label: Lux Lower Limit
Value.Help: Set lux lower limit level.

Value.label: Lux Recover Limit
Value.Help: Set lux recover limit level. Refer to Param 51.

Value.label: UV Upper Limit
Value.Help: Set UV upper limit level.

Value.label: UV Lower Limit
Value.Help: Set UV lower limit level.

Value.label: UV Recover Limit
Value.Help: Set UV recover limit level. Refer to Param 51.

Value.label: Temperature Scale
Value.Help: Set the scale for temperature when reports.

Value.label: LED Activity
Value.Help: Allow user to enable/disable LED activity of specific reports sent by sensor. Button press indicator is not affected by this.

Value.label: Motion Sensor Report Indicator
Value.Help: If LED is enabled by Param81, allow user to change the report color of motion sensor.

Value.label: Temperature Sensor Report Indicator
Value.Help: If LED is enabled by Param81, allow user to change the report color of temperature sensor.

Value.label: Humidity Sensor Report Indicator
Value.Help: If LED is enabled by Param81, allow user to change the report color of humidity sensor.

Value.label: Lux Sensor Report Indicator
Value.Help: If LED is enabled by Param81, allow user to change the report color of Lux sensor.

Value.label: UV Sensor Report Indicator
Value.Help: If LED is enabled by Param81, allow user to change the report color of UV sensor.

Value.label: Vibration Sensor Report Indicator
Value.Help: If LED is enabled by Param81, allow user to change the report color of vibration sensor..

Value.label: Battery Report Indicator
Value.Help: If LED is enabled by Param81, allow user to change the report color of battery.

Value.label: Wakeup Report Indicator
Value.Help: If LED is enabled by Param81, allow user to change the report color of wakeup.

Value.label: Communication Indicator
Value.Help: If LED is enabled by Param81, allow user to change indicator color when receiving communication from gateway or other devices.

Value.label: Automatic Report Checklist 1
Value.Help: Checklist 1 for automatic timed report. When the corresponding item is selected, it will be checked when timeout setting by Param111. Default 241 = 1 + 16 + 32 + 64 + 128, means all enable. Disabled value=0 Battery value=1 UV value="16 Temperature value=32 Humidity value=64 Lux value=128

Value.label: Automatic Report Checklist 2
Value.Help: Checklist 2 for automatic timed report. When the corresponding item is selected, it will be checked when timeout setting by Param112. Max value 241 = 1 + 16 + 32 + 64 + 128, means all enable. Disabled value=0 Battery value=1 UV value="16 Temperature value=32 Humidity value=64 Lux value=128

Value.label: Automatic Report Checklist 3
Value.Help: Checklist 2 for automatic timed report. When the corresponding item is selected, it will be checked when timeout setting by Param113. Max value 241 = 1 + 16 + 32 + 64 + 128, means all enable. Disabled value=0 Battery value=1 UV value="16 Temperature value=32 Humidity value=64 Lux value=128

Value.label: Automatic Checklist 1 Interval Time
Value.Help: Interval time set in seconds to check the checklist1’s items. Multilevel Sensor Report will be sent when timeout.

Value.label: Automatic Checklist 2 Interval Time
Value.Help: Interval time set in seconds to check the checklist2’s items. Multilevel Sensor Report will be sent when timeout.

Value.label: Automatic Checklist 3 Interval Time
Value.Help: Interval time set in seconds to check the checklist3’s items. Multilevel Sensor Report will be sent when timeout.

Value.label: Temperature Offset Value
Value.Help: Can add or minus this setting value to calibrate temperature when checked. Scale is defined by Param64. e.g. Value 15 means 1.5C

Value.label: Humidity Offset Value
Value.Help: Can add or minus this setting value to calibrate humidity when checked. Unit: %.

Value.label: Lux Offset Value
Value.Help: Can add or minus this setting value to calibrate Lux when checked.

Value.label: UV Offset Value
Value.Help: Can add or minus this setting value to calibrate UV when checked.
